name: Munsie's Typing Adventure
description:
After several years in cryo sleep you awaken to find the ship's combat and worker drones have turned against the crew. Stop as many bots as you can while fighting your way to the escape pods!

The game features 12 levels full of randomized words and 3 boss fights, all available on 3 different difficulty levels to accommodate to a variety of skill levels. There's also an endless wave defense mode to truly push you to your typing limits.

'Esc' to quit/return to menu.

'Backspace' clears your typed progress if you need to change targets.

The full source code for this game can be found on my Gitlab -- I haven't tested it but you should be able to run it on Linux or Mac from source.
